channel.title: How to give rewards for voting?
channel.description: Okay so i want to give rewards to my players for voting..but i want it to do it automatically..but i cant tell if they voted...so how can i set up a system that tells if they voted and it gives them something ingame?? (CodeUsa Base) Pulse Pk Source

item.title: How to give rewards for voting?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

There’s no way you can tell if they voted, because you don’t have access to the votes database – or any pages involved with the voting. What most servers do, though, is give them a link that’ll link to the voting page and when they click the link it’ll have them enter their account name. When they enter that, it’ll send them to the voting page and give them their reward. You just have to hope they actually sent in the vote.

Read full topic
item.source: How to give rewards for voting?
